Daily Art Roundup

147 words written on Tue, Jan 14 2003

…this isn’t really a daily feature, but i didn’t feel like making each of these a seperate post:

Russian Ark: A film about time travel cut in one continuous shot. Oh yeah. Coming to the DC area the 31st.

…

Stopped by the used record store today and the sale bin was busting with interesting titles. I got a few.

Maybe it’s a sign of getting older, that my music tastes lean towards the chilled, but I am really digging the Innocence Mission. You can stream their stuff from mp3.com. Really into this band, but I’m afraid they won’t be playing out before we leave country.
